headline: Eaton Dividend Raise And Portfolio Changes Reshape Income And Growth Story
summary: Eaton (NYSE:ETN) has approved a 6% increase in its quarterly dividend, signaling continued emphasis on shareholder returns. The company has completed recent acquisitions aimed at reinforcing its core business areas. Eaton has divested its Mobility business to sharpen focus on priority operations. Eaton, listed on the NYSE under ticker ETN, operates across electrical, aerospace, and industrial markets, supplying power management and related solutions. For investors, the mix of a higher...
